ygData.subject: RE: Greetings All!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 49th is the same as any other level, just hard to find stuff that gives you exp, since a lot of stuff is green that used to be blue.  45th is definitely a
ygData.messageBody:
>
> I, myself, made 35th level last night, which I have learned
> is the second of
> at least three "hell levels" where your experience is somehow
> "watered down"
> to slow you down. 30th level was like this, but I am told
> 35th is worse, and
> 40th is worse still. Don't know anyone on my server to have
> reached 45th or
> 49th to tell me whether they are the same, as well.

49th is the same as any other level, just hard to find stuff that gives you
exp, since a lot of stuff is green that used to be blue. 45th is definitely
a hell level, and is the worst. Took me 10 days to get from 45 to 46,
playing every day several hours. Half-bubble to a bubble for a long game
day is a good thing. Getting a bubble at 45 is like getting a whole normal
level it feels like. Bet you can't wait now hehe.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 9 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
